Constructor Detail

public FlowerMaker()
Method Detail

draw25Grass

public void draw25Grass()
Copies draw5Grass 5 times to look like multiple grass spots. Turtle will end up in the center of the drawing facing right one in the center 2 on the right and 2 on the left

draw5Grass

public void draw5Grass()
Draw's 5 blades of grass. 10px Wide All blades will be Atleast 20 px high and blade 5 is 20 px high Color is ORANGE Turtle will be centered on the bottom of the grass and facing right

drawTwoSquarePetaledFlowers

public void drawTwoSquarePetaledFlowers()
Draw's 2 square petaled flowers 120 px apart at the center turtle at the center

squarePetaledFlower

public void squarePetaledFlower()
This method will draw a square petaled flower and will not affect the location or heading of the turtle. The FlowerMaker starts at the bottom center of the flower 200px by 10 px stem. Flower center is 16.666 px in radius. Petals are 33.333 px wide and long. Colors: Petals-Blue Stem-green Center- Red
